OSR_POWER.description: OSR power - configures ADC to have an oversampling ratio of 2^OSR_POWER

N_SH_TOTAL_CYCLES.description: Total number of clock cycles for the sample-and-hold circuit

N_SH_ACTIVE_CYCLES.description: Number of clock cycles that the sample-and-hold circuit will actually be enabled, to allow non-overlapping clocks

N_BOTTOM_PLATE_ACTIVE_CYCLES.description: Number of clock cycles that the bottom sampling capacitor plates will be connected to the sample net

N_SAR_CYCLES.description: Number of clock cycles that the SAR logic will take for each segment, both positive and negative phases (so the whole SAR logic will take 8 * N_SAR_CYCLES)

N_INT1_TOTAL_CYCLES.description: Total number of clock cycles that the INT1 state will take

N_INT1_ACTIVE_CYCLES.description: Total number of clock cycles in which the INT1 state will be active

N_INT2_TOTAL_CYCLES.description: Total number of clock cycles that the INT2 state will take

N_INT2_ACTIVE_CYCLES.description: Total number of clock cycles in which the INT2 state will be active

START_CONVERSION.description: When a 1 is written, begins the ADC conversion. Also serves as a flag that means the ADC is ready to convert

CLKGEN_DRP_DO.description: Stored read data for CLKGEN xip

CLKGEN_DRP_RD_EN.description: When a 1 is written, reads the data in the CLKGEN IP at the address specified by CLKGEN_DRP_DADDR and stores in the {CLKGEN_DRP_DO1, CLKGEN_DRP_DO0} registers

CLKGEN_DRP_WR_EN.description: When a 1 is written, writes the data in {DRP_DI1, DRP_DI0} to the address of the CLKGEN xip specified by CLKGEN_DRP_DADDR

CLKGEN_DRP_DEN.description: Starts a dynamic reconfiguration transaction for the CLKGEN xip
